ai_description: Get personalized insights, workout recommendations, and meal suggestions based on your data. Our AI analyzes patterns to provide actionable recommendations for your health journey.
start_tracking: Start tracking your health data, then use the buttons above to generate AI-powered recommendations.
insights_generated_desc: New AI insights have been created based on your health data.
workout_recommendations_desc: AI has generated personalized workout recommendations for you.
meal_suggestions_desc: AI has generated personalized meal suggestions for you.
failed_to_generate: Failed to generate insights. Please try again.
rate_limit_exceeded: AI rate limit exceeded. Please try again later.
credits_exhausted: AI credits exhausted. Please add credits to continue.
